001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003/**
004 * Factory interface for class that aims to create PokemonTrainer instance.
005 * 
006 * @author fv
007 */
008public interface IPokemonTrainerFactory {
009
010        /**
011         * Creates and returns a PokemonTrainer instance.
012         * 
013         * @param name Name of the created trainer.
014         * @param team Team of the created trainer.
015         * @param pokedexFactory Factory to use for creating associated pokedex instance.
016         * @return Created trainer instance.
017         */
018        PokemonTrainer createTrainer(String name, Team team, IPokedexFactory pokedexFactory);
019        
020}
